pkgmetadata.longdescription: # International Address formatterThis is a address formatter that can format addresses in multiple formats that are commonin different countries.For formatting the addresses the `worldwide.yml` from [OpenCageData address-formatting repository](https://github.com/OpenCageData/address-formatting) is used to format the address according to customs in the country that is been encoded.## API documentationThe complete project contains actually only one class:### `AddressFormatter`Publicly accessible method prototypes are:```pythondef __init__(self, config=None): passdef format(self, address, country=None): passdef one_line(self, address, country=None): pass```#### `__init__`Initialize the address formatter- `config`: (optional) override default config file to use for the address formatter, defaults to config file included in this package#### `format`Format an address in the default layout used in the specified country. Return value may contain line breaks.- `address`: Dictionary that contains the address parts, see below for recognized keys- `country`: Country code of the formatting template to useRecognized keys in `address`:- `attention`- `house`- `road`- `house_number`- `postcode`- `city`- `town`- `village`- `county`- `state`- `country`- `suburb`- `city_district`- `state_district`- `state_code`- `neighbourhood`#### `one_line`Works the same as `format` but returns a single line of text.
